channel.title: magnusson
channel.description:
Hello, I wondered why they did not add magnusson of half life 2 episode 2 in the chapter anomalous matérials, they added éli and kleiner but not magnusson, it would have been funny, I imagined a scene when gordon destroyed the flat of magnusson and magnusson comes up behind him and he gets angry after he tries the distributor and all the cans out of a sudden. Imagine your scénario? And that is that someone could create a magnusson youngest and the scene?
(sorry for my bad english, i'm french)

item.title: magnusson
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Magnusson was not in Half Life therefore he was not in Black Mesa. This question did not warrant its own thread. Small questions belong here.Locked.
